title: Archives | Episode 7
description:
Reeling from her father’s death, we hear Clementine and Shadow first meet. Dodson teams up with The Archivist. We learn how The Institute has been monitoring Clementine. Sadie and Billie convince Clementine to step out of her comfort zone. [Adult Content]
~~
From QCODE, makers of fantastic audio fiction. Visit QCODEMedia.com to learn more. And, check out some of our other shows including: The Left Right Game with Tessa Thompson, Borrasca with Cole Sprouse, Blackout with Rami Malek, Soft Voice with Naomi Scott.
